Date: Monday, 7/28/1975
Subject: Progress of Joe McIntosh
Dear Sir,
Joe McIntosh is doing pretty good at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
He has an ERA of 3.58, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
